creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: abstract image; white lines on brown ground creating sketchy head and shoulders of woman
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: LRC in the print, in pencil: [Toshi]; LLC in bottom margin, in pencil: [No. 5]; LRC in bottom margin, in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida 1952]
title: No. 5
